main_topic.author: VassiliPh
main_topic.title: Gemma 2 - any success?
main_topic.content:
Has anyone succeeded in using new Gemma 2 (it was just released today) for this competition?

[https://www.kaggle.com/models/google/gemma-2/keras](https://www.kaggle.com/models/google/gemma-2/keras)

comments.author: Kasahara
comments.content:
I couldn't run it due to a GPU memory error. 

So, I downloaded the LLM locally as shown in [this code](https://www.kaggle.com/code/kasafumi/gemma2-9b-it-llm20-questions), and it worked in my test environment.

However, creating the submit file would exceed the capacity of the output directory, so i could not submit.
comments.date: Posted a month ago  ·  82nd in this Competition

reply.author: Mitsutani
reply.content: I've been trying to use Gemma 2 as well. I downloaded your notebook's output and compressed it on my computer, then submitted the compressed file but it didn't pass validation (the logs were empty). Do you have any idea why that could be or how to change the code so that main.py runs only on the files in /submission? I'm new to this so any help is appreciated.
reply.date: Posted 24 days ago  ·  19th in this Competition
